definition: the act of suspending something (hanging it from above so it moves freely)
details:
noun
- the act of suspending something (hanging it from above so it moves freely)
= example: the act of suspending something (hanging it from above so it moves freely)
= synonyms: suspension
- a form of capital punishment
- decoration that is hung (as a tapestry) on a wall or over a window
= example: decoration that is hung (as a tapestry) on a wall or over a window
= synonyms: wall hanging
